Judul: STUDI KELAYAKAN KEUANGAN UNTUK CV PUTRA PRATAMA DALAM PEMANFAATAN LAHAN DAN OPSI MEMBUKA TOKO
Abstrak: Putra Pratama is one of the producers of roses in Lembang. Previously Putra Pratama has a dairy cattle business unit. Over time, operational costs, especially for animal feeds, are increasingly high, but milk selling prices can not necessarily go up because of the selling price controlled by the Cooperative, which makes Putra Pratama decide to close the division. Now the land that used to be used for grass as one of the dairy feed was no longer used. The demand for roses continues to increase, both from within and outside the country. Japan is one of the destinations for the export of roses. For domestic territory demand spread all over Indonesia. East Java is the largest producer of roses in Indonesia while West Java is ranked third. Of the total production in Indonesia is still not enough to meet market demand both within and outside the country. Currently Putra Pratama owns a 6,000 m rose plantation and plans to expand 4,000 m from the former grassland. Until now, Putra Pratama sells its products to collectors or collectors. For collectors who are currently with the addition of 4,000 m of production still has not covered demand from the market owned by the collector. But Putra Pratama has the option to open its own shop. This study aims to assist Putra Pratama in viewing the facilities of land use for use as an expansion of rosewood and also in the option to open a shop. In this study, the authors perform market analysis, operational, human resources, and financial. From the analysis, the authors found gap or the difference between the supply and demand of roses where the number of demand more than the existing demand, which means Putra Pratama has a market to sell roses from land expansion. The author performs various analyzes, such as analysis from the side of marketing, operations, human resources, and finance. In performing financial analysis of writer use method of NPV (Net Present Value), IRR (Internal Rate of Return), PP (Payback Period), ROI (Return on Investment), and ROE (Return on Equity). Based on this analysis can be said to be feasible if the value of the project NPV is greater than zero and IRR greater than the WACC (Weight Average Cost of Capital). After doing the various analysis for expansion with the value of NPV is greater than 0 (zero) and IRR greater than WACC and analysis for open store with the value of NPV is greater than 0 (zero) and IRR greater than WACC, show the business / project is feasible to do, the authors can recommend to expansion by utilizing the existing land and can open their own flower shop. The author also recommends an optional range of products, prices, locations, and marketing, this can help Putra Pratama in maximizing the benefits and resources owned.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Ir. Drs. H. Arson Aliludin, SE, DE
Kata Kunci: Analisa finansial, NPV, IRR, perkebunan mawar, membuka toko.
